statements: SELECT * FROM demand_prediction;
SELECT product_id, demand_date FROM demand_prediction WHERE demand_value > 100;
SELECT demand_date, demand_value FROM demand_prediction ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT demand_value FROM demand_prediction WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM demand_prediction;
SELECT * FROM demand_prediction WHERE demand_value > 100 ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, demand_date FROM demand_prediction WHERE demand_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_id, demand_value, demand_date FROM demand_prediction WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY demand_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(demand_value) AS avg_demand_value, MAX(demand_value) AS max_demand_value FROM demand_prediction;
SELECT * FROM demand_prediction WHERE product_id = 2 AND demand_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM demand_patterns WHERE demand_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM demand_patterns WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(demand_value) AS max_demand_value FROM demand_patterns;
SELECT AVG(demand_value) AS avg_demand_value, MIN(demand_value) AS min_demand_value FROM demand_patterns WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_demand_value FROM prediction_results WHERE prediction_date = CURDATE();
SELECT id, timestamp, demand_value FROM demand_patterns WHERE demand_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_demand_value FROM prediction_results WHERE predicted_demand_value < 50 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM demand_patterns INNER JOIN prediction_results ON demand_patterns.id = prediction_results.id WHERE demand_value > 200 AND predicted_demand_value < 100
SELECT id, timestamp FROM demand_patterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT MAX(demand_value) AS max_demand, MIN(demand_value) AS min_demand FROM demand_patterns
SELECT * FROM time_series_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT demand, timestamp FROM time_series_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_predictions WHERE prediction >= 0.5;
SELECT timestamp, prediction FROM demand_predictions WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY prediction ASC;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%seasonality%';
SELECT id, timestamp, demand FROM time_series_data WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, prediction, timestamp FROM demand_predictions WHERE prediction BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8 ORDER BY prediction ASC
SELECT * FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE 'learning%'
SELECT id, timestamp, demand FROM time_series_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_value >= 0.1 ORDER BY parameter_name
SELECT * FROM demand_patterns;
SELECT timestamp, demand_value FROM demand_patterns WHERE demand_value > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp, demand_value FROM demand_patterns ORDER BY demand_value DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, demand_value FROM demand_patterns WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, timestamp, demand_value FROM daily_demand WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM demand_patterns WHERE demand_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, demand_value FROM demand_patterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND demand_value < 50 ORDER BY demand_value ASC;
SELECT month, year, SUM(demand_value) AS total_demand FROM monthly_demand GROUP BY month, year HAVING total_demand > 500 ORDER BY year, month DESC;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_demand FROM demand_predictions WHERE predicted_demand BETWEEN 200 AND 300 ORDER BY prediction_date;
SELECT date, day_of_week, AVG(demand_value) AS avg_demand FROM daily_demand WHERE day_of_week = 'Saturday' GROUP BY date, day_of_week ORDER BY avg_demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_patterns;
SELECT pattern_name, timestamp FROM demand_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 3;
SELECT pattern_name, demand_data FROM demand_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY pattern_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_predictions WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND prediction_value > 100;
SELECT season, factor_value FROM seasonal_factors WHERE pattern_id = 5 ORDER BY factor_id ASC;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name, demand_data, timestamp FROM demand_patterns;
SELECT * FROM demand_predictions WHERE prediction_value > 1000;
SELECT pattern_name, season, factor_value FROM demand_patterns dp JOIN seasonal_factors sf ON dp.pattern_id = sf.pattern_id;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_value BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY parameter_name DESC;
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_date, observed_value, prediction_error FROM prediction_errors ORDER BY prediction_date ASC, prediction_error DESC;
